name: snowby
description: Emby frontend that plays media in an external player.

scripts.package: npm run format-all && npm run package-all
scripts.package-win: electron-packager . --overwrite --icon=./desktop/asset/img/snowflake.ico --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --ignore pdn/ --ignore screenshot/ --ignore m3u/ --ignore mpv.log --ignore keep-awake_data/ --ignore snowby-ipc.log --ignore snowby-linux-x64 --ignore snowby-win32-x64 --ignore logs/
scripts.package-lin: electron-packager . --overwrite --icon=./desktop/asset/img/snowflake.ico --platform=linux --arch=x64 --ignore pdn/ --ignore screenshot/ --ignore m3u/ --ignore mpv.log --ignore keep-awake_data/ --ignore snowby-ipc.log --ignore snowby-linux-x64 --ignore snowby-win32-x64 --ignore logs/
